quotes.text: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Smile, breathe, and go slowly.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: Joy is not in things; it is in us.
quotes.author: Richard Wagner

quotes.text: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
quotes.author: Omar Khayyam

quotes.text: Happiness is a direction, not a place.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.text: Choose to be optimistic, it feels better.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: Happiness is the best makeup.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.text: Count your age by friends, not years.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: This too shall pass.
quotes.author: Persian Proverb

quotes.text: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Sadness flies away on the wings of time.
quotes.author: Jean de La Fontaine

quotes.text: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: What hurts you teaches you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Sometimes you have to accept the fact that certain things will never go back to how they used to be.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The wound is the place where the light enters you.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Every adversity, every failure, every heartache carries with it the seed of an equal or greater benefit.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: Sometimes the most productive thing you can do is rest.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Rest and self-care are so important. When you take time to replenish your spirit, it allows you to serve others better.
quotes.author: Eleanor Brownn

quotes.text: Fatigue is the best pillow.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Take rest; a field that has rested gives a bountiful crop.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.text: You can't pour from an empty cup.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Even the strongest need to rest.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Sometimes you need to step outside, get some air, and remind yourself of who you are and who you want to be.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: The best cure for the body is a quiet mind.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.text: Slow down and everything you are chasing will come around and catch you.
quotes.author: John De Paola

quotes.text: It's not stress that kills us, it is our reaction to it.
quotes.author: Hans Selye

quotes.text: Stress is caused by being ‘here’ but wanting to be ‘there’.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.text: Sometimes the most important thing in a whole day is the rest we take between two deep breaths.
quotes.author: Etty Hillesum

quotes.text: Give your stress wings and let it fly away.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.text: You don’t have to control your thoughts. You just have to stop letting them control you.
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.text: Calm mind brings inner strength and self-confidence.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: Don't stress the could haves. If it should have, it would have.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Sometimes, the best thing you can do is not think, not wonder, not imagine, not obsess. Just breathe and have faith that everything will work out for the best.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Rule your mind or it will rule you.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.text: Every day brings new choices.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.text: Love recognizes no barriers.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: Where there is love there is life.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
quotes.author: David Viscott

quotes.text: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.text: You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.text: True love stories never have endings.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.text: Love is a friendship set to music.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.text: Love cures people — both the ones who give it and the ones who receive it.
quotes.author: Karl Menninger
